info.name: Django Boilerplate
info.description:
A boilerplate that can be used as a template for quickly setting up a repository for a web application with the following stacks:

1. **Backend** in _Django_
2. **Frontend** in _ReactJS_
3. **Application** in _React Native_
4. **Stable Storage** in _PostgreSQL_
5. **Warehousing/Lake** in _MongoDB_

item.name: User App
Testing APIS
item.description: Dummy APIs that do not commit any changes to the backend but are used to test out different types of authentication in the backend.

request.description: Register a new user to the system; this only creates a new normal user and cannot be used to register moderators, administrators, etc.
Used to login any user with their username/email and password.
Used to get information about a registered user; if the userId is not provided in the params, the requesting user's information is returned.
API that is used to search for a given user.

request.description: API that is used to edit the profile information about a user.
API used to delete a user.

header.value: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS

item.description: Deals with user management functionality: creations, update, delete, etc.

item.name: Admin App
